name: hyperexcitable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
reacting very strongly to stimuli (= things that cause a physical reaction): People who are unfortunate enough to have migraines have cells in their brains that are hyperexcitable. Patients with alcohol withdrawal present with a hyper-excitable state. Related word
hyperexcitability
More examplesFewer examplesThe condition may be the result of hyper-excitable adrenaline nerve endings in the bladder neck and prostate.In this state a person may be euphoric, expansive, and sometimes agitated and hyperexcitable.Newborns with the condition can be hyperexcitable.
